title.narrative: Food security for 16,990 men, women and children living with HIV/AIDS and improved livelihoods for 5,100 adults living with HIV/AIDS in western Kenya

description.narrative: This project will improve food security and livelihoods for 17,000 women, men, orphans and vulnerable children affected by HIV/AIDS in western Kenya and reduce discrimination and rights abuse. 5,740 households will be food secure, eating more nutritious food that reduces opportunistic infections and delays the onset of AIDS. 5,100 adults living with HIV/AIDS will establish or upgrade their own businesses, 60% of which deliver an increased annual income of at least 20%;

participating-org.narrative: Rural Education and Economic Enhancement Programme (REEP)

recipient-country.narrative: Matayos, Matungu, Samia and Nambale Districts, Western Province, Kenya

receiver-org.narrative: Rural Education and Economic Enhancement Programme (REEP), Kenya
